page.title: 17RECREATION 1-COMMUNITY CTR.
page.content:
{VILLAGE COMMUNITY CENTRE.
This was opened in 1971. A Sports Hall was added later, paid for by fund-raising activities and a grant from the Sports Council. The big hall has a stage for dance bands, concerts etc.There is a canteen,an office and a number of smaller rooms. The Centre is run by a Management Committee of volunteers. Two part-time Wardens co-ordinate the many activities, which include Radio Clubs, Youth Clubs, the Friday Club for the elderly and the disabled, table tennis, five-a-side football, bowls, badminton, weight- lifting and aerobics. A Play Group and a Mother and Toddler Group are run by volunteers. Old Age Pensioners, the Women's Institute and British Legion meet, and the County Library holds a weekly session here. { G.Gettings.
